item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Olde School Saloon and Bistro

We had a great time when we had a happy hour at Olde School last time, so we've decided to go again!

Olde School Saloon and Bistro is located at State near Court St, across from the train station. From the vintage copper bar right down to the classic antique punch-button cash register, this is a great place. The smell of yucca fries with chipotle sauce doesnâ€™t hurt their charm either : )

They have generously offered to extend their usual happy hour specials for us until 7pm (normally they end at 6pm).

The contact for this event is Dev, phone number in RSVP

http://oldeschoolsalo...

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Olde School
